# unifi_network (Data Source)

Retrieves information about a UniFi network.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) The ID of the network. If provided, will be used for lookup.
- `name` (String) The name of the network. If provided, will be used for lookup.

### Read-Only

- `purpose` (String) The purpose of the network.
- `subnet` (String) The subnet of the network.
- `vlan_id` (Number) The VLAN ID of the network.
